text:
e="preserve">Zoran Stojković (; 7 October 1946 — 6 July 2020) was a Serbian politician. He was Minister of Justice in the Government of Serbia from 2004 to 2007 when Vojislav Koštunica was Prime Minister. He was born in Belgrade. He was a member of the Democratic Party of Serbia.
Stojković died on 6 July 2020 in Belgrade, aged 73.
